thread.title: Jamie Lynn Spears' Daughter Is All Smiles Leaving The Hospital
thread.title_full: Jamie Lynn Spears' Daughter Is All Smiles Leaving The Hospital

author: Abigail Williams
title: Jamie Lynn Spears' Daughter Is All Smiles Leaving The Hospital
text:
Jamie Lynn Spears' Daughter Is All Smiles Leaving The Hospital What a relief! 02/10/2017 04:38 pm ET Abigail Williams Associate Editor, News & Emerging Platforms at The Huffington Post 
It‚Äôs been a long, harrowing week for Jamie Lynn Spears and her family, but it looks like the worst may be behind them. Spears‚Äô 8-year-old daughter Maddie, who was hospitalized this week after an ATV accident , has left the hospital in high spirits. 
Spears‚Äô husband, Jamie Watson, shared a photo of his family departing the hospital on Instagram. Maddie is grinning from ear to ear. A photo posted by Jamie (@jamiewatson985) on Feb 10, 2017 at 10:17am PST 
‚ÄúThanks to the amazing first responders, and medical teams at University and Children‚Äôs Hospital in New Orleans, LA, we are headed home with our baby girl as she continues to recover,‚Äù Watson captioned the photo. ‚ÄúAbove all else we are so thankful for each and every prayer, because we know that is what truly made the difference. Thank you again to everyone. We are truly blessed.‚Äù 
Jamie Lynn echoed her husband‚Äôs sentiments in a tweet Friday. We're headed home with our baby girl as she continues to recover. Thank you again to everyone. We are truly blessedüôè pic.twitter.com/4Q684K8th2 ‚Äî Jamie Lynn Spears (@jamielynnspears) February 10, 2017 
Maddie has been hospitalized since Sunday after a serious ATV accident. According to a police report obtained by People , Maddie was riding an ATV in view of her mother and stepfather when she overcorrected on a turn , flipping the vehicle into a pond. The 8-year-old was listed in critical, but stable condition before finally regaining consciousness Tuesday . According to a statement from the hospital where she was treated, Maddie has not suffered ‚Äú any neurological consequences from the accident.‚Äù 
Britney Spears shared news of her niece‚Äôs recovery on Twitter, where she thanked her followers for their prayers and support. ‚Äî Britney Spears (@britneyspears) February 10, 2017 
This is just the good news we needed to hear today. Wishing the Spears family the best as Maddie continues to recover! Also on HuffPost
